item.title: How to hide content from the hive
item.description: Add the path of your private folder(s) to the .gitignore right after creation. If you follow the [[How to use Obsidian|vault creation process]], the path should look like this: content/Hive Mind/notes/<REPLACE WITH YOUR FOLDER NAME> If added after pushing, the file(s) will already be on GitHub.

item.title: How to use GitHub
item.description: GitHub is a version control, file hosting service. How to set up GitHub on your computer Create an account at https://github.

item.title: How to use Obsidian
item.description: Why would you use obsidian? Obsidian is a dedicated editor for markdown files (format in which the hive is written). It is the inteded way to use the hive.
